Dear Zaheera,

Good day to you.

We at EV Lab require your immediate support regarding the after-sales service currently provided by Gargash. Our insurance provider, GIG, needs a formal confirmation from Gargash that they will be the one to provide after-sales service for NIO cars.

Previously, we encountered a delay of nearly a week with Kevin’s car due to the absence of this confirmation. While we managed to resolve that situation, we must ensure such delays do not recur for our future leasing clients.

Your prompt assistance in securing this confirmation is crucial to maintaining seamless operations and delivering exceptional service to our clients. Please prioritize this matter and let us know how we can expedite the process.


Best regards,

Your prompt assistance in securing this confirmation is crucial to maintaining seamless operations and delivering exceptional service to our clients. Please prioritize this matter and let us know how we can expedite the process.


Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental

Dear All,

 

Thank you for your email and for bringing this matter to our attention.

 

Kindly note that we already have a signed agreement in place with Gargash, confirming them as the official after-sales service provider for NIO vehicles in the UAE.

 

However, the formal confirmation should be issued by us — NIO Auto General Trading — as we are the official entity responsible for vehicle delivery and customer handover. Please find the signed service agreement attached for your reference.

 

Kindly consider this email as confirmation to avoid any future delays and support seamless service for your leasing clients.

 

 

 

Best Regards

However, the formal confirmation should be issued by us — NIO Auto General Trading — as we are the official entity responsible for vehicle delivery and customer handover. Please find the signed service agreement attached for your reference.

 

Kindly consider this email as confirmation to avoid any future delays and support seamless service for your leasing clients.

 

 

 

Best Regards

 

Fawzi Nazzal

Aftersales Manager

 +971 56 42 91313

 

NIO UAE, Abu Dhabi
